taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section canadenses;species multilicius;

treatment.description: Suggesting slender no. 148 but the primocane strongly armed with broad-based hard triangular-subulate divergent prickles; petiole, peliolules and midribs beneath of primocane-leaflets very prickly; leaflets caudate-acuminate, lanceolate or narrowly ovate, glabrous; raceme corymbiform, broad across the summit, elevated high above the bracts, the very slender filiform arched-ascending to spreading pedicels mostly 3.5-6 cm. long; calyx-lobes narrowly lanceolate, slender-tipped.
